Description:
WHAT A VIEW! WHAT A BARGAIN PRICE! OWNER SAYS SELL! GREAT TENANT
So affordable giving the purchaser the opportunity to buy well and enjoy the views and size of this great home. Built approx 30 years ago this home represents strength, so well built. Potential for the future with 3 living spaces, 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, all immaculately kept and room to improve with views of Corio Bay. Features include; 2 toilets, wood heater, double carport and undercover outdoor living/balcony with bay views. Owners say sell now, so please call me for a private inspection. So easy to maintain, great for investor as well as owner occupier. OWNER SAYS SELL!
Insights: 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Superb Views
Dream of relaxing with refreshments after a long day at work on the upper balcony of this lovely home close to the Drysdale shopping centre and local amenities. Expansive water views greet your field of vision taking in the outskirts of Geelong to the west across Corio Bay to the You Yangs and on to the Bellarine Hills in the east. The northerley views are a feature of the entire upstairs living area.
The open plan kitchen, dining and living areas are complimented by ageless, solid Blackwood cabinetry, spacious work area, natural gas cook top, dishwasher, quality window furnishings and as-new carpet. All immaculately presented.
The master bedroom is situated at the front of the upper level with spacious proportions, large walkin robe, ceiling fan and adjacent ensuite. There is also a small area nearby which would be suitable for a computer nook.
Downstairs on entering the home you are greeted by a spacious entry way with a generous second bedroom with bay window, window seat and BIRs. There is access to the family bathroom from this bedroom. Towards the rear of the home is the generous family bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Ample storage space is located throughout this level. Situated at the rear of the home is a second living/family zone with access to outside decks and a further two bedrooms perfect for use as a home office or study.
Other features include bedroom fans, internal vacuum,
reverse cycle air conditioners and double garage with remote door. Brand new fencing to the west side and a compact, well maintained garden and outdoor area complete this beautifully presented home.
Rhonda Humpage : 0457 313 609
Insights: 57 Parrakoola Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
WAKE UP TO THESE VIEWS
The current owners wake up to a different view every day. This home has been designed so you enjoy the views from the living room and two of the bedrooms. The balconies are configured so you can sit out of the wind for breakfast, lunch or dinner. This two bedroom plus study /third bedroom home is
meticulously maintained and nothing to do except pull up a chair, look out the window and count the number of ships passing through Corio Bay. This home will provide no excuses to keep busy.
Galley type kitchen works very well for entertaining. Internal access through remote garage. This house is all about comfort and views.

Great Potential At This Price
This established 3 bedroom brick home is just waiting for the right person to transform it from its original state into a modern day home. Spacious lounge with electric heating and air-conditioning. Tiled kitchen with electric cooking and intimate dining nook. Central bathroom. Outside is a covered enclosed yard, double steel garage and plenty of room for the dog. Set on a 600m2 block and with plenty of room to extend out or up.

Description:
Location, Lifestyle & Views!
The vendors of this very desirable parcel are land will be sad to sell but they have other ventures they want to move on in 2015. This 500m2 allotment has so much to offer the fortunate new purchasers. Situated a handy stroll to central Drysdale village shopping precinct and sitting in the centre of the booming Bellarine Peninsula district this block is right to build on now or add to your investment portfolio. Surrounded by quality built homes and offering excellent bay views from a two story dwelling this select parcel of land is a rare find in today's market place. The frontage measures 14m. Reserve/play ground across the road just adds to the feeling of space! Contact Agent for more details.

Description:
DRESS CIRCLE.
Impeccably presented 3 bedroom home in an extremely sought after location. This home is ideal for the retiree or first home buyer looking for LOCATION LOCATION. All 3 bedrooms have built-in robes and are serviced via a stunning new bathroom. The open plan living area has vaulted timber ceiling which creates a feeling of a bright and airy, open space. Kitchen provides a stainless gas cooker, rangehood and pantry. Climate controlled by the gas ducted heating and the ducted evaporative cooling units. Outside you'll find the covered rear deck, plus garage and carport all nestled amongst landscaped gardens all of which makes this property a must see. Ring today!

Address: 48 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Bellarine Lifestyle with Spectacular Bay Views
Built from Macquarie stone this home exudes the quality and grandeur of a times past. Set on an elevated allotment of almost 4 acres (15,400m2) and positioned to take advantage of the views over Corio Bay and surrounding countryside. The home comprises 2 kitchens, 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 3 living rooms, 3 open gas fireplaces, 12' and 16' vaulted ceiling. Other features include double glazed windows throughout complimenting the north facing passive solar design with its wrap around verandas and an elevated covered balcony overlooking the expansive landscaped garden with private jetty set over a dam and creek setting.
This craftsman built property has been continually developed over several years and there are too many features to properly describe. Please call to arrange your own private inspection of this unique property.
Note: Photograph of the Bay is the Actual Views from the property.
Insights: 48 High Ridge Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Your Dream Home With Water Views Starts Here!
Build your dream home in this peaceful & established neighbourhood close to all amenities including the Drysdale Shopping Centre, highly regarded schools, public transport and of course being only a short stroll from dipping your toes in the water along the Bellarine Peninsula.
With the previous home partially burnt down you can use the existing slab and frame if you choose to (subject to the relevant requirements/approvals) saving you thousands of dollars on your building costs.
Plans from the existing home are available upon request.

Description:
Superbly Constructed & Designed Units - Only Unit 2 remaining!
Situated next to parkland in a quiet court location these well designed quality constructed units are ideally suited for those looking to downsize, investors or first home buyers. Tastefully decorated with neutral interiors & easily maintained gardens surrounds the modern units have an easy flow floorplan for today's modern living!
The four units comprise of:
•Entrance foyer
•Three bedrooms with built in robes
•Master bedroom has a walk-in-robe & ensuite
•Bathroom has separate bath & shower
•Well-appointed open plan kitchen/dining/living room
•Units 1 & 2 - single garage
•Unit 4 - double garage
An excellent investment, terrific real estate at a competitive price!

Description:
Enjoy Coming Home!
Tucked neatly and privately in one of Clifton Springs quiet tree lined streets is this bright and sunny 3 bedroom home. If you're looking for a first home, a long term investment, or just want to live in a quiet neighbourhood then make the time to come and view this property. Built with polished timber flooring and open-plan living and dining space, 3 generously proportioned bedrooms and an external studio currently being used as a guest room. The kitchen is spacious, and it overlooks the living area. Full ensuite to the main bedroom. European laundry magically appears from the hallway. Outside is a paved rear patio and private backyard. Single carport, under house storage, and side access for boat or caravan.

Description:
Just A Stroll To The Waters Edge!
This spacious 4 bedroom cedar home is situated just an easy stroll to the foreshore and handy to the Clifton Springs boat ramp. Split level open plan living incorporates family & lounge rooms with French doors on both sides. The cathedral ceilings & timber features of this home create a marvellous feeling of space and character that will appeal to most buyers. Attic style rooms above provide amazing space for storage or could even be used as a study. The country style kitchen is functional, has a large walk in pantry and doors to rear deck area. Solid fuel & electric heating keep the home comfortable all year round. The property backs onto reserve with rural aspects. Not the run of the mill property this home is a must to inspect.

Description:
Big bayside home encourages family bliss!
This family-friendly design delivers great space and privacy. The expansive floor plan includes 4 bedrooms, 4 living areas, an office, two bathrooms, a powder room and secure storage for the family vehicles as well as ‘toys’. The idyllic bayside setting adds to the allure. The result is family bliss!
Spacious living zones encourage togetherness and accommodate individual activities. The office is ideally placed for a home-based business. The lounge is a relaxed spot for adult conversation. The open plan kitchen/living zone is a true family hub boasting connection to outdoor entertaining and vision over the fabulous playground. Solid Caesarstone bench tops, a walk-in pantry and suite of 900mm cooking appliances feature in the classy kitchen. The roomy family room makes an ideal media room or ‘kids only’ toy room.
The bedrooms radiate off the upstairs living space, providing a safe space for children to play before bed or first thing in the morning. Luxuries in the master bedroom include a swish en suite with double vanity, walk-through robe and private balcony. Children are equally spoilt in 3 bedrooms featuring built-in robes and stunning bay views.
Wet areas are contemporary and spotless. Two split systems assist comfort. Central heating throughout.
Established sunny gardens are an oasis for children and pets, and the thatched-roof hut provides a special place for adults to entertain. The DLUG, façade parking bay and gates to the backyard accommodate boats, caravans and extra vehicles.
This quiet and desirable pocket between Bayshore Avenue and the bay is close proximity to The Dell, the boat ramp, parklands and the golf club. Also, just a short stroll to school and the local shops.
View ASAP!
Insights: 27 Clifton Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Enter the Market (renovators delight)
Opportunity for the astute buyer to get into the market with a good solid bricks and mortar investment. This property would do well with a renovation to the kitchen and bathroom and freshen up with paint and carpet. Offering Kitchen meals area, separate lounge, three bedrooms and a large rumpus room at the rear of the home. other features include undercover parking and a large iron shed in the backyard. The property is located close to Clifton Springs golf course and beach and its elevated position offers some water views. The property is available for private inspection so please call to arrange a suitable time.

Description:
Spectacular Golf Course Location
This lovely 3 bedroom home is set on a 600m2 block and directly backs onto the Clifton Springs Golf Course looking over the fairways and into the Bay from the North lounge room.
There is an ensuite off the main bedroom with a double shower, central heating, split system, timber kitchen and a lovely lounge/family area opening to a sheltered BBQ area. The backyard has an established veggie garden, access to the large garage and a gate leading directly on to the 1st fairway.
If you want a weekender with Bay views and golf course access or simply a brilliant aspect from a comfortable home then phone now for an inspection.

Description:
Investors Delight or First Home Buyers Dream
This neat and welcoming home is privately located at the end of a cul de sac. The layout offers an open plan lounge and dining area with a slow combustion wood fireplace. The adjacent kitchen complete with modern appliances and spacious meals area or second living zone, opens directly onto an outdoor area and to a further alfresco space for entertaining.
There are polished timber floors throughout the living spaces and additional heating/cooling via the reverse cycle system. This home's three bedrooms are all close to the central family bathroom, which has a corner spa.
This property is a fantastic opportunity for the astute investor or ideal for a first home buyer.

Description:
Holidays By The Beach
This 3 bedroom brick home is ideal for those looking to get away from the city. The area is surrounded by wineries and just 15 minutes to boat ramp, bay and surf beaches. Large lounge/dining area overlooks the rear yard. Separate family room off the kitchen has access to the decking for summertime meals and late afternoon drinks. Well appointed kitchen with electric cooking and dishwasher. Full ensuite and built-in robes. Ducted gas heating keeps you warm in winter. Outside is a double garage with remote door and easy care gardens. Currently tenanted at $310 per week on a periodic tenancy. Buy now and spend holidays by the beach.

Address: 115 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Bay Side Living at it's best
This solid home offers value for money boasting a lounge and dining room, kitchen, living room, rumpus room, three bedrooms and undercover parking for 2 vehicles.
The Coonara wood burner is a highlight in lounge / living room and the second living is relaxed and merges with an undercover outdoor entertaining area and north-facing garden.
The kitchen has up-dated appliances including a fan forced wall oven, instant heat cooktop and large range hood. With a good line of sight from the kitchen to indoor-outdoor living areas, the chef will feel included.
The master sits privately at the front of the home with built-in robes and a freshly updated en suite. The second and third bedrooms are queen sized with built-in robes. They share a bright bathroom with bath and shower and separate powder room.
Both bathrooms boast recent refurbishment.
There are 2 off street parks in front of the double carport off Elanora Way, and double gates to the backyard off Bay Shore Avenue = Plenty of space for a boat or other 'toys'.
If affordable bay side living is what you are looking for, then the hunt stops here! View immediately!
Kerri Hughes : 0456 444 085
Insights: 115 Bay Shore Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
